defect_calculations 的原始碼

# defect_calculations.py



[文件]
def calculate_defects_MT(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    miss1_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss1').sum()
    miss2_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss2').sum()
    miss3_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss3').sum()
    miss12_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss12').sum()
    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()
    miss23_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss23').sum()
    dirty = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    key = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss123').sum()
    key_ok = (df['DefectType'] == 'key+ok').sum()

    w_count = key_ok
    r_count = miss2_count + miss1_count + miss12_count + key_ok
    g_count = miss1_count + miss3_count + miss13_count + key_ok
    b_count = miss2_count + miss3_count + miss23_count + key_ok
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    total_count=miss1_count + miss2_count + miss3_count+miss12_count + miss13_count + miss23_count +key + key_ok
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,dirty,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count





[文件]
def calculate_defects_DC2(df):
    AlignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'AlignKey').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    Dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Dirty').sum()
    Keymiss123_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Key(Miss123)').sum()
    miss1_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss1').sum()
    miss2_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss2').sum()
    miss3_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss3').sum()
    miss12_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss12').sum()
    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()
    miss23_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss23').sum()
    Nokey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = miss2_count + miss1_count + miss12_count + ok_count
    g_count = miss1_count + miss3_count + miss13_count + ok_count
    b_count = miss2_count + miss3_count + miss23_count + ok_count
    total_count=miss1_count + miss2_count + miss3_count+miss12_count + miss13_count + miss23_count +ok_count+Keymiss123_count+Dirty_count
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,Dirty_count,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count





[文件]
def calculate_defects_inner1(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'key+ok').sum()
    miss1_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss1').sum()
    miss2_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss2').sum()
    miss3_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss3').sum()
    miss12_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss12').sum()
    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()
    miss23_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss23').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    Dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    Key_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss123').sum()
    Nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'nokey').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = miss2_count + miss1_count + miss12_count + ok_count
    g_count = miss1_count + miss3_count + miss13_count + ok_count
    b_count = miss2_count + miss3_count + miss23_count + ok_count
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    total_count=miss1_count + miss2_count + miss3_count+miss12_count + miss13_count + miss23_count +ok_count + Key_count+Dirty_count
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,Dirty_count,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count





[文件]
def calculate_defects_RDL1(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    failed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle failed').sum()
    cornerkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    hurt_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'hurt').sum()
    hole_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Black hole').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    Key_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss123').sum()
    break_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'RDL break').sum()
    Nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    scratchfailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'scratch failed').sum()
    Viafailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Via failed').sum()
    AlignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'AlignKey').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = failed_count
    g_count = hurt_count
    b_count = hole_count
    Dirty_count = dirty_count + scratchfailed_count + Viafailed_count + hurt_count + failed_count +hole_count +break_count
    total_count=ok_count + Key_count+Dirty_count
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,Dirty_count,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count

def calculate_defects_RDL2(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    failed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle failed').sum()
    cornerkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    hurt_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'hurt').sum()
    hole_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Black hole').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    Key_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss123').sum()
    break_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'RDL break').sum()
    Nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    scratchfailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'scratch failed').sum()
    Viafailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Via failed').sum()
    AlignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'AlignKey').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = dirty_count
    g_count = break_count
    b_count = scratchfailed_count
    Dirty_count = dirty_count + scratchfailed_count + Viafailed_count + hurt_count + failed_count +hole_count +break_count
    total_count=ok_count + Key_count+Dirty_count
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,Dirty_count,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count

    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    failed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle failed').sum()
    cornerkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    hurt_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'hurt').sum()
    hole_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Black hole').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    Key_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss123').sum()
    break_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'RDL break').sum()
    Nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    scratchfailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'scratch failed').sum()
    Viafailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Via failed').sum()
    AlignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'AlignKey').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = Viafailed_count
    g_count = 0
    b_count = 0
    Dirty_count = dirty_count + scratchfailed_count + Viafailed_count + hurt_count + failed_count +hole_count +break_count
    total_count=ok_count + Key_count+Dirty_count
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0

def calculate_defects_inner2(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    failed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle failed').sum()
    cornerkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    hurt_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'hurt').sum()
    hole_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Black hole').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    Dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    Key_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'key').sum()
    break_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'RDL break').sum()
    Nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    scratchfailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'scratch failed').sum()
    Viafailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Via failed').sum()
    AlignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'AlignKey').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = 0
    g_count = 0
    b_count = scratchfailed_count
    Dirty_count = Dirty_count + scratchfailed_count
    total_count=ok_count + Key_count+Dirty_count
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,Dirty_count,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count




[文件]
def calculate_defects_MT2(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    miss1_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss1').sum()
    miss2_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss2').sum()
    miss3_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss3').sum()
    miss12_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss12').sum()
    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()
    miss23_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss23').sum()
    dirty = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    key = (df['DefectType'] == 'key').sum()
    alignkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'alignkey').sum()
    cornerkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    aislekey= (df['DefectType'] == 'aislekey').sum()
    mtfailed = (df['DefectType'] == 'mtfailed').sum()
    particle = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle').sum()
    blank_count= (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = miss2_count + miss1_count + miss12_count + ok_count
    g_count = miss1_count + miss3_count + miss13_count + ok_count
    b_count = miss2_count + miss3_count + miss23_count + ok_count
    defect_count=dirty+particle+mtfailed
    particle_count=particle
    mtfailed_count=mtfailed
    dirty_count=dirty
    total_count=miss1_count + miss2_count + miss3_count+miss12_count + miss13_count + miss23_count + key + ok_count + defect_count
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,defect_count,total_count, particle_count,mtfailed_count,dirty_count




[文件]
def calculate_defects_EMC(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'Ok').sum()
    bad_count= (df['DefectType'] == 'Lose').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = 0
    g_count = 0
    b_count = 0
    Dirty_count = 0
    total_count=96721
    particle_count=0
    defect_count=0
    mtfailed_count=0
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,Dirty_count,total_count,particle_count,defect_count,mtfailed_count

def calculate_defects_MTCartier(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    miss1_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss1').sum()
    miss2_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss2').sum()
    miss3_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss3').sum()
    miss12_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss12').sum()
    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()
    miss23_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss23').sum()
    dirty = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    key = (df['DefectType'] == 'key').sum()
    alignkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'alignkey').sum()
    cornerkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    aislekey= (df['DefectType'] == 'aislekey').sum()
    mtfail = (df['DefectType'] == 'mtfail').sum()
    particle = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle').sum()
    blank_count= (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    keypeeling_count= (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = miss2_count + miss1_count + miss12_count + ok_count
    g_count = miss1_count + miss3_count + miss13_count + ok_count
    b_count = miss2_count + miss3_count + miss23_count + ok_count
    defect_count=dirty+particle+mtfail
    particle_count=particle
    mtfailed_count=mtfail
    dirty_count=dirty
    misscount=miss1_count+miss2_count+miss3_count+miss12_count+miss13_count+miss23_count+key
    total_count=92352
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,defect_count,total_count, misscount,mtfailed_count,dirty_count

    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()

    alignkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'alignkey').sum()
    cornerkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    aislekey= (df['DefectType'] == 'aislekey').sum()

def calculate_defects_INNER1Cartier(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    miss1_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss1').sum()
    miss2_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss2').sum()
    miss3_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss3').sum()
    miss12_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss12').sum()
    miss13_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss13').sum()
    miss23_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'miss23').sum()
    dirty = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    key = (df['DefectType'] == 'key').sum()
    alignkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'alignkey').sum()
    cornerkey = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    aislekey= (df['DefectType'] == 'aislekey').sum()
    mtfail = (df['DefectType'] == 'mtfail').sum()
    particle = (df['DefectType'] == 'particle').sum()
    blank_count= (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    keypeeling_count= (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = miss2_count + miss1_count + miss12_count + ok_count
    g_count = miss1_count + miss3_count + miss13_count + ok_count
    b_count = miss2_count + miss3_count + miss23_count + ok_count
    defect_count=dirty+particle+mtfail
    particle_count=particle
    mtfailed_count=mtfail
    dirty_count=dirty
    misscount=miss1_count+miss2_count+miss3_count+miss12_count+miss13_count+miss23_count+key
    total_count=92352
    return w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count,defect_count,total_count, misscount,mtfailed_count,dirty_count

def calculate_defects_RDLCartier(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    cornerkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    hurt_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'hurt').sum()
    hole_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blackhole').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    specialkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'specialkey').sum()
    nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    viafailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'viafail').sum()
    alignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'alignkey').sum()
    aislekey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'aislekey').sum()
    shift_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'shift').sum()
    liftofffail_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'liftofffail').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = shift_count
    g_count = hurt_count
    b_count = hole_count
    defect_count = dirty_count + viafailed_count + hurt_count +hole_count + liftofffail_count+shift_count
    total_count=92352

    return w_count, shift_count, hurt_count,hole_count,defect_count,total_count,viafailed_count,liftofffail_count,dirty_count

def calculate_defects_INNER2Cartier(df):

    cornerkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'cornerkey').sum()
    hurt_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'hurt').sum()
    hole_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blackhole').sum()
    blank_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'blank').sum()
    dirty_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'dirty').sum()
    specialkey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'specialkey').sum()
    nokey = (df['DefectType'] == 'Nokey').sum()
    viafailed_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'viafail').sum()
    alignKey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'alignkey').sum()
    aislekey_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'aislekey').sum()
    shift_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'shift').sum()
    liftofffail_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'liftofffail').sum()

    w_count = ok_count
    r_count = shift_count
    g_count = hurt_count
    b_count = hole_count
    defect_count = dirty_count + viafailed_count + hurt_count +hole_count + liftofffail_count+shift_count
    total_count=92352

    return w_count, shift_count, hurt_count,hole_count,defect_count,total_count,viafailed_count,liftofffail_count,dirty_count

def calculate_defects_CUCartier(df):
    #df['DefectType'] = df['DefectType'].astype(str)
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 0).sum()
    cantfind_count = (df['DefectType'] == -1).sum()
    blank_count1 = (df['DefectType'] == -2).sum()
    blank_count2 = (df['DefectType'] == 90).sum()
    rsizesmall_count = (df['DefectType'] == 2).sum()
    bsizesmall_count = (df['DefectType'] == 3).sum()
    residue_count1 = (df['DefectType'] == 4).sum()
    residue_count2 = (df['DefectType'] == 79).sum()
    gsizesmall_count = (df['DefectType'] == 5).sum()
    csizesmall_count = (df['DefectType'] == 6).sum()
    cusizebig_count = (df['DefectType'] == 7).sum()
    lose_count1 = (df['DefectType'] == 101).sum()
    lose_count2 = (df['DefectType'] == 80).sum()
    rdlbreak_count = (df['DefectType'] == 108).sum()
    viafailed_count=0
    liftofffail_count=0
    dirty_count=0
    blank_count=blank_count1+blank_count2
    residue_count=residue_count1+residue_count2
    lose_count=lose_count1+lose_count2

    defect_count = cantfind_count + residue_count + lose_count
    total_count=92352

    return ok_count,defect_count,lose_count,residue_count,cantfind_count,total_count,viafailed_count,liftofffail_count,dirty_count





[文件]
def calculate_defects_EMCCartier(df):
    ok_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'ok').sum()
    lose_count = (df['DefectType'] == 'fail').sum()
    key = (df['DefectType'] == 'key').sum()
    residue_count=0
    cantfind_count=0
    viafailed_count=0
    liftofffail_count=0
    dirty_count=0

    defect_count=lose_count
    total_count=92352

    return ok_count,defect_count,lose_count,residue_count,cantfind_count,total_count,viafailed_count,liftofffail_count,dirty_count
